author: Laura Shin
title: 10 Tips For Creating Your Own Ideas Island Experience - In Photos: 10 Tips For Creating Your Own Ideas Island Experience - Forbes
text:
10 Tips For Creating Your Own Ideas Island Experience By Laura Shin Whether or not you make it to one of the actual Ideas Islands , you can create your own such experience as long as you find a secluded place to be in nature and clear a week off your schedule so you can relax undisturbed. Here are some tips based on my experience and that of other guests.
Photo: Vifarnaholme (Courtesy Sam Jenkins and James Springall)
